item.description: There actually is no meetup date as yet but I would like these dates to be on weekends. Since there is no such group in the Boston area, I figure I would create one to see if there is any interest. No volleyball equipments as yet but we can work it out if there is enough members. 30 days before my card gets charge so join before I cancel:-)
item.name: The Boston 2s Beach/Grass Volleyball Meetup
